title: Benin Money Supply M0
description: Money Supply M0 in Benin decreased to 878550 XOF Million in August from 907400 XOF Million in July of 2022. Money Supply M0 in Benin averaged 581534.31 XOF Million from 2004 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 1150300 XOF Million in December of 2021 and a record low of 191918 XOF Million in November of 2004. This page includes a chart with historical data for Benin Money Supply M0.
author: Central Bank of West African States (BCEAO)
